You mean in the skybox or actual black holes you can encounter?

The former is easy enough to mod. The latter doesn't make sense because black holes do not exist inside planetary systems... unless of course apocalyptic disaster is looming.
As soon as I saw the title I knew it was from this movie

It is out of the scope of the game. But a way to interstellar travel similar to the movie was planned. It was going to be invisible tho.

It was going to be something like this: you search in the planets some clues that there is some strange in the the current star system, then you use some device to track the location more precisely, you go there, and bam! you are in another star system.

The new star systems, or even the starting one, was going to be random.
